text: Ochromima megalopoides is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1866. It is known from Brazil, Guyana, Surinam and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Ochromima megalopoides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1866
title: Ochromima megalopoides
